intro: Euphrasia omiensis, commonly known as the Omian eyebright, is a flowering plant native to the high-altitude regions of the Alps. It belongs to the Orobanchaceae family and is characterized by its small, yellowish flowers that bloom in early summer. The plant typically grows in rocky or grassy slopes, thriving in cool and moist environments. Its leaves are lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, while its flowers are clustered in racemes. Euphrasia omiensis is valued in traditional herbal medicine for its potential health benefits.
